parameters.name: authenticationType
parameters.description: The type of authentication integration points used when signing into the web portal. Defaults to Standard. Standard web portals are authenticated directly through your identity provider. You need to call CreateIdentityProvider to integrate your identity provider with your web portal. User and group access to your web portal is controlled through your identity provider. IAM Identity Center web portals are authenticated through IAM Identity Center. Identity sources (including external identity provider integration), plus user and group access to your web portal, can be configured in the IAM Identity Center.

parameters.name: portalArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the web portal.

nested_items.name: additionalEncryptionContext
nested_items.description: The additional encryption context of the portal.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: authenticationType
nested_items.description: The type of authentication integration points used when signing into the web portal. Defaults to Standard.

nested_items.name: browserSettingsArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the browser settings that is associated with this web portal.

nested_items.name: browserType
nested_items.description: The browser that users see when using a streaming session.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The creation date of the web portal.

nested_items.name: customerManagedKey
nested_items.description: The customer managed key used to encrypt sensitive information in the portal.

nested_items.name: dataProtectionSettingsArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the data protection settings.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The name of the web portal.

nested_items.name: instanceType
nested_items.description: The type and resources of the underlying instance.

nested_items.name: ipAccessSettingsArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IP access settings.

nested_items.name: maxConcurrentSessions
nested_items.description: The maximum number of concurrent sessions for the portal.

nested_items.name: networkSettingsArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the network settings that is associated with the web portal.

nested_items.name: portalArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the web portal.

nested_items.name: portalEndpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint URL of the web portal that users access in order to start streaming sessions.

nested_items.name: portalStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the web portal.

nested_items.name: rendererType
nested_items.description: The renderer that is used in streaming sessions.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: A message that explains why the web portal is in its current status.

nested_items.name: trustStoreArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the trust store that is associated with the web portal.

nested_items.name: userAccessLoggingSettingsArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the user access logging settings that is associated with the web portal.

nested_items.name: userSettingsArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the user settings that is associated with the web portal.
